attributes.background:
When are dentists going to reopen?
Many people and children are in severe pain and some resort to DIY
jobs because of it. Dentists perform an extremely vital service which could lead to serious problems in the long term if left untreated. Give our well respected dentists PPE and let them reopen.

rejection.details:
Dentists are scheduled to begin operating again from 8 June in England.  You can read more here:

https://www.england.nhs.uk/coronavirus/wp-content/uploads/sites/52/2020/03/Urgent-dental-care-letter-28-May.pdf
